This application was created as a course project at the university for the 3rd year.

node.summary: At practice after the 2nd year of university, I needed to create a small information system. We could have come up with the system ourselves, and therefore, having just got acquainted with web technologies (Vue, Express, MongoDb, MSSQL), I planned to...
